Title: Finding Benchmark Accounts on Xiaohongshu
Content: To find benchmark accounts on Xiaohongshu, you can use several methods. First, utilize the search function. For example, if you want to create a custom avatar account, type 'avatar' in the search bar and filter the top 50 accounts to find suitable benchmarks. Second, explore the homepage channels. Expand the channels to find relevant categories, such as the avatar channel, and identify your peers. Third, after browsing related accounts for a while, the system will recommend more similar accounts based on your interests. Fourth, use third-party platforms like QianGua, HuiTun, and XinBang to search for avatars. However, these platforms often require a membership fee, making them less cost-effective for beginners. By using these methods, you can quickly find benchmark accounts to guide your content creation.

Title: Analyzing Benchmark Accounts
Content: Once you have identified benchmark accounts, the next step is to analyze them thoroughly. Start by 'copying homework,' which means examining their nickname, avatar, bio, background image, homepage layout, topic selection, and content format. Make appropriate modifications and apply these elements to your account. Next, learn about their traffic generation strategies. Observe how they place WeChat links on their homepage, guide followers to secondary accounts, and use comment sections to encourage group joins or private messages. Categorize and summarize these tactics to minimize risks. Finally, study their product models. Identify their low-cost and high-cost products, as well as their monetization methods, whether through store sales or private domain monetization. By mastering these aspects, you can effectively drive traffic and start your monetization journey.

Title: Implementing Traffic Generation and Monetization Strategies
Content: Implementing effective traffic generation and monetization strategies is crucial for success on Xiaohongshu. Begin by placing WeChat links or other contact methods on your homepage to guide followers to secondary accounts. Use engaging hooks in the comment section to encourage users to join groups or send private messages. Observe and categorize different traffic generation tactics used by benchmark accounts to find what works best for you. For monetization, identify the types of products your benchmark accounts offer, including low-cost and high-cost options. Determine whether they monetize through store sales or private domain methods. By combining these strategies with your unique content, you can attract a loyal audience and generate revenue. Consistently refine your approach based on performance metrics to optimize results.
